main_title: Lix sawir oo sharxaya isbadalka cimilada
main_standfirst: Baar sida iyo sababta cimilada dhulka ay isu badaleyso, iyadoo hoggaamiyeyaasha dunida ay ku ururayaan Paris, si ay uga hadlaan gaarista heshiis loogga hortagayo diirimaadka hawada
temperature_par_1: Cel celis ahaan heerkulka dusha sare ee dhulka ayaa sare kac uu ku yimid, qiyaas dhan 0.85C boqolkii sano ee u danbeysay. Afar iyo tobanka sano ee ugu kulul 13 kamid ah ayaa la diiwaan galiyey qarniga 21-aad, sanadka 2015-kana wuxuu ku socdaa in kulaylku uu gaaro heer hor leh.
temperature_char_title: Sidee sannaduhu ugu dhigmaan celcelis ahaan qarnigii 20-aad
coldest: Ma la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii ugu qaboobaa?
second_coldest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii labaad ee ugu qaboobaa?
third_coldest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii saddexaad ee ugu qaboobaa?
fourth_coldest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii afraad ee ugu qaboobaa?
fifth_coldest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii shanaad ee ugu qaboobaa?
sixth_coldest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii lixaad ee ugu qaboobaa?
seventh_coldest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii toddobaad ee ugu qaboobaa?
eighth_coldest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii sideedaad ee ugu qaboobaa?
ninth_coldest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii sagaalaad ee ugu qaboobaa?
tenth_coldest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii tobnaad ee ugu qaboobaa?
warmest: Waxay noqonaysaa sannaddii ugu kululayd taariikhda
second_warmest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii labaad ee ugu kulalaa?
third_warmest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii saddexaad ee ugu kulalaa?
fourth_warmest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii afraad ee ugu kulalaa?
fifth_warmest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii shanaad ee ugu kulalaa?
sixth_warmest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii lixaad ee ugu kulalaa?
seventh_warmest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii toddobaad ee ugu kulalaa?
eighth_warmest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii sideedaad ee ugu kulalaa?
ninth_warmest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii sagaalaad ee ugu kulalaa?
tenth_warmest: Miyaa la diiwaan galiyey sanadkii tobnaad ee ugu kulalaa?
greenhouse_sub_title: Neefta beerta dadan, badanaa neefta noolaha
greenhouse_par_1: Saynisyahanada ayaa aaminsan in neefaha ay sii daayaan warshadaha iyo beeraha (oo loo yaqaan uumi baxa) ay kusii kordhiyeen saameynta beeraha dadan ee dabiiciga, iyo sida jawiga dhulka ula fal galo tamartaa ka imaaneysa dhanka qorraxda.
greenhouse_par_2: Hawlaha bani'aadamka sida gubidda dhirta la shito sida dhuxusha, saliiddaiyo gaaska dabiiciga ah waxay kordhinayaan xaddiga kaarboon laba oksaydh{CO2}, oo ah tan ugu weyn ee sameysa wasakhda hawada ee diirrimaadka caalamka keenta. Keymaha nuuga kaarboonka ayaa sidoo kale jarid lagu hayaa.
greenhouse_par_3: Culeyska ay ku hayaan jawiga wasaqda qiiqa waxey ka badan tahay waqtiyadii hore, illaa iyo 800,000 sano, wuxuuna gaarey May-dii sanadkan meel aad u sareysa
greenhouse_chart_key: Isku cel celiska bishiiba ee wasaqda qiiqa ee urursan (Million qeybtiiba)
greenhouse_chart_source: Barnaamijka wasaqda qiiqa, xog laga helay xarunta cilmi xidigsta lagu darso
ice_par_1: Heerkul sareeya, dhacdooyin cimilo aad u xun iyo sare u kaca joogga biyaha badda, ayaa waxaa dhammaan lala xiriiriayaa cimilada sii kululaaneysa, waxeyna ku yeelan karaan qeybaha dunida saamey aad u xun.
ice_par_2: Illaa iyo 1991-dii, joogga biyaha badda ayaa sare u kacey isku cel celis ahaan 19cm dunida oo idil. Heerka sare u kaca joogga biyaha badda ayaa aad u xawaareeyey tobanaankii sano ee u danbeeyey, taasoo halis galisay jasiirado badan iyo dalalka joogoodu hooseeyo.
ice_par_3: Sii fogaanshaha barafka cirifka ayaa qeyb muhiim ah ka ah sare u kaca
ice_par_4: Barafka badda Arctic ayaa sidoo kale sii naaqusaya, sababtuna waxay tahay heerkulka sareeya wuxuuna wax yar gacan ka gaystay in heerka baddu uu sare u kaco
ice_vis_key_fact: Cabir aan rasmi aheyn oo dhan barafka badda, oo toban laab la'eg cabirka UK, ayaa baaba'ay, marka la barbar dhigo cel celis ahaan heerka illaa iyo 1990-kii.
ice_vis_chart_title: Barafka badda Arctic 1980-kii wuxuu ku fadhiyay 7.8 milyan oo iskuweer kiiloo mitir, sanadkan 2015-kana wuxuu ku fadhiyaa 4.6 milyan oo iskuweer kiloo mitir
replay: Xigasho: Xarunta xogta qaran ee barafka
ice_vis_source: Xigasho: Xarunta qaran ee xogta iyo barafka
future_subtitle: Heerkul sare iyo cimilo aad u xun oo tiro badan
future_par_1: Heerka ay la ekaan karto iyo raadka aan la hubin
future_par_2: Isbadaladan ayaa keeni kara yaraanshaha biyaha, keeni kara isbadalo waa weyn oo kuyimaada xaaladaha dhanka wax soo saarka, sababi karana kor u kaca dhibaatooyin sida daadad, duufaano, hirar kulul iyo abaaro.
future_par_3: Maxaa yeelay tani waxa weeye isbadalka cimilada la filayo iney sare u kacdo mararka qaar ee dhacdooyinka cimilada aadka u xun - si kastaba la xiriirinta wax kasta oo dhaca isbadalka cimilada waa wax adag.
future_vis_main_title: Isbadalka heerkulka iyo mashruuca (1986-2005 illaa iyo 2081-2100)
future_vis_part_1_par_1: Haddii beerta dadan neefahooda uumi baxooda gaaro inta u dhaxeysa 2010-2020, kadibna si weyn hoos ugu dhaco (RCP2.6).
future_vis_part_2_par_1: Haddii uumi baxa neefaha beerta dadan ay sii socoto sare u kacooda inta uu socdo qarniga 21-aad
future_vis_source: Isha: Warbixinta sahminta shanaad ee isbadalada cimilada guddiga caalamiga (AR5)
actions_subtitle_top_ten: Tobanka dal ee neefaha beerta dadan ugu uumi bax badan
actions_chart_title: Tobanka dal ee neefaha beerta dadan uumi baxa ay sameeyaan in ka badan 70% si guud ahaaneed sii deynta neefaha
limiting_damage_par_1: 146 dal ayaa gudbiyey qorshahooda qaran ee cimilada lagulana dagaalamayo qiiqa, taasoo la filayo in lagu qaabeeyo isku xirka heshiiska caalamiga ee is badalka cimilada
limiting_damage_par_2: Sida laga  soo xiganayo. warbixintii Qaramada Midoobay ee October, kuwaasoo gudbiyey rayigooda haatan ee sara u kaca 2.7째C, ka sare xiliga warshadaha kahor ee heerka 2100
limiting_damage_par_3: Saynisyahanada ayaa go'aamiyey haddii heerkulka uu ka sare maro 2째C, in taasi ay keeni doonto raad halis ah oo isbadalka cimilada ah, oo ay si gaar ah u saameyn doonto dalalka saboolka ah.
ave_warming_source: Xigasho: Climate Action Tracker, Macluumaadkan waxaa isku soo duba riday ECOFYS, New Climate Institute iyo Potsdam Institute for Climate Impact Research.
credits_para: Naqshad ay samaysay Emily Maguire, ayna horumariyeen Steven Connor iyo Punit Shah. Waxaa qoray soona saaray Nassos Stylianou and Paul Rincon.
onward_journey_title: Shirka cimilada ee Qaramada Midoobay 30-ka Nov-11-ka Dec
onward_journey_disclaimer: BBC-du mas'uul kama aha waxyaabaha ay qoraan goobaha Internet-ka ee dibadda ka ah.

onward_journey_link_text_3: Dheeraad: Warbixin gaar ah ee Wararka BBC oo ku saabsan isbeddelka cimilada.  (in English)

linkedin_title: Wararka BBC: Lix muuqaal oo sharraxaya isbeddelka cimilada.
linkedin_summary: Soo ogow sida iyo sababta cimilada adduunku ay isu-beddelayso iyadoo hoggaamiyeyaasha caalamku isugu tegayaan Paris si ay uga wada xaajoodaan heshiis wax lagaga qabto diirrimaadka caalamka.
ie8_message: Goobtan waxaa loogu talagalay baarayaasha casriga ah ee website-yada, si buuxdana uma taageereyso noocaada baaraha Internet-ka.
